entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early this morning. 40 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle early this morning. Wind becoming north 20 km/h late this afternoon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 11 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Clearing. High minus 1.
